txt.en: Lhôs-uksa-Wôt is near the bright-lily glade.\n\nYou should bring a bright-lily to Lhôs-uksa-Wôt.
Decorate Wose buildings in Drû Bhûta ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bright-lilies can be found in the Drúadan Forest.\n\nYou should collect bright-lilies.

The Wose lets out a satisfied laugh that echoes through the trees. She seems pleased, though her face remains still. She gestures you to look again at the glade, where you find many more of these bright-lilies. The Wose motions for you to pick more of them, then meet her back at the village where you will give light to the Woses and luck to their hearts.
The White Stag may have vanished but a beautiful flower glows in its place.
Drû Bhûta is located in Taur Drúadan.\n\nYou should return to Drû Bhûta and decorate the village with bright-lilies.

You examine the flower. It is some sort of lily by the likes you have never seen before. Its glow feels warm, but it does not give off heat. The flower almost seems transparent, like something from a dream. You should pick up the flower and bring it to Lhôs-uksa-Wôt.
